originalText.text: Dr. Beheshtian was very professional and I feel I am in good hands as this was my first time. Her office was welcoming and staff were great as well. I like that she was attentive to my concerns and doing a full workup!

text.text: Dr. Beheshtian was very professional and I feel I am in good hands as this was my first time. Her office was welcoming and staff were great as well. I like that she was attentive to my concerns and doing a full workup!

originalText.text: Do not recommend- while the office staff are absolutely wonderful, I found the doctor to be very inattentive. My experience has been long waits for a 2-minute visit where I feel talked over, rushed, and generally inconvenient. In my most recent experience, I waited months for a follow-up tele-health visit that the Dr. arrived 20 minutes late to, had about 30 seconds to explain my concern before feeling like a bother, had information thrown at me that was not explained, and left the call borderline crying because I didn't have a chance for a full discussion before the doctor walked out of the visit to see the next patient. Our conversation lasted about 3 minutes... good patient care cannot happen in that time. I typically leave appointments more anxious than I entered due to a whirlwind of an appointment where I have more questions than answers.

originalText.text: We had a great experience working with this medical team. n top of being a highly knowledgeable, Dr. Beheshtian was very helpful and generous with her time and provided a great care for my father.

text.text: We had a great experience working with this medical team. n top of being a highly knowledgeable, Dr. Beheshtian was very helpful and generous with her time and provided a great care for my father.

originalText.text: Dr. Beheshtian and her staff have gone above and beyond in my years of going to Avicenna Cardiology. Dr. Beheshtian is very attentive to the needs of her patients and takes the extra time to talk through issues to get to the root of the problem, or rule out all other potential issues. Her staff is very attenetive and incredibly helpful with logistics and assisting with any insurance issues that other offices generally leave to patients. Would highly recommend!

originalText.text: I had a great experience with the entire office. From the front desk to meeting with the Dr, everything was seamless from start to finish. Dr. Beheshtian was thorough and has a great bedside manner.
